description:
The 200 ZoneKnit™ Energy Wind Long Sleeve T-Shirt is icebreaker's highly breathable midweight top for high-output activities. This base layer top combines icebreaker’s moisture-wicking and super-soft Cool-Lite™merino jersey fabric with body-mapped eyelet mesh panels for exceptional breathability. Offset shoulder seams eliminate friction when you're on the move.

Silky-soft merino and TENCEL™ Lyocell, sourced from eucalyptus plantations, combine to create icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a luxurious fabric that naturally regulates your body’s microclimate. Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino 200 ZoneKnit Energy Wind LS Tee - Mens
